import { useState } from 'react' import React from 'react' const AddPost = ({ onAdd}) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [price, setPrice] = useState('') const [image, setImage] = useState('') const [Description, setDescription] = useState('') const [location, setLocation] = useState('') return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setPrice(e.target.value)}/>
setDescription(e.target.value)}/>
setImage(e.target.value)}/>
setLocation(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default AddPost
